description: The Deviator Mitts are perfect for those who enjoy alpine starts and need extra warmth during active cold weather activities. The XReflex™ insulation system reflects radiant body heat to improve thermal retention, while the goat leather overlays at the palm and fingertips provide durability. The low-profile pull-on loop makes it easy to put the mitts on, even with cold hands. Movement-mirroring stretch compliments the hand's natural articulation and delivers a superior fit. Constructed for active shoulder season and cool weather activities, the Deviator Mitts are built to push the pace in warmth and comfort.
